name: Lab Security
description:
The Lab has been hacked! You have been tasked with clearing out the corrupted security systems with an old manual tank.

This is a top-down shooter with obstacles.

Reach the exit for all 30 levels. You get 1 star for beating the level, 1 star for killing all enemies, and 1 star for taking no damage.

Version 1.1.0

- Added fullscreen functionality

- Upgraded graphics to 1080p

- Various bits of polish
